Title: Ixion Saga DT
Description: ['The game and anime follow Kon Hokaze, a boy who embarks on a journey from our world to an alternate world known as Mira, which is full a mysterious energy known as Alma. After saving Princess Ecarlate from attackers, he soon finds himself in the middle of a struggle around Alma.']
Voices: ['Eguchi, Takuya', 'Fukuyama, Jun', 'Kamiya, Hiroshi', 'Mikami, Shiori', 'Nakai, Kazuya', 'Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Shintani, Ryouko', 'Suzumura, Kenichi', 'Saiga, Mitsuki', 'Kobayashi, Yuu']
Staff: [['Takamatsu, Shinji', 'Director'], ['Nakano, Hideaki', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Matsuda, Kiyoshi', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Takahashi, Hideya', 'Episode Director, Storyboard']]
